title: Your Index Fund Has Diamond Hands
sub_head: Active managers struggle to beat index funds, but they have the advantage of being able to dump obviously overvalued meme stocks, while the latter can’t
body:
Does it matter if your chairman has a small wee-wee?
The revelation was worth half a billion dollars to shareholders of GameStop when the company’s chairman, Ryan Cohen, tweeted out the confession, written backward, on Monday. What about seeing your chief executive in his underwear? That was good for a whopping $3 billion rise in market value for AMC Entertainment Holdings back in June when CEO Adam Aron lost control of his laptop camera during an interview.
